Articles.Content:
Has any one or could anyone run a general circulation model (large scale weather simulation) for kerbin to see what the weather would be like?

If so what are the results like?

Could a general circulation model be used in conjunction with EVE to create real kerbin weather?
I think the circulation would just go around the equator and spiral into the poles like venus, but I know nothing about metereology or air currents to be reliable. Just my 2 cents..
